column1: It is the flesh-covered sac that hangs between the legs at the base of the penis and contains the testicles.
They are located in the scrotum, along with other small organs, blood vessels, and a small tube called the vas deferens.
The scrotal sac will be slightly raised with the testicles lying side by side.

A testicle ultrasound is done to: - Help determine why one or both testicles have become larger - To look at a mass or lump in one or both of the testicles - Find the reason for pain in the testicles - Show how blood flows through the testicles
